A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's rough if you love classic star wars. They made sure Luke was the last Jedi but didn't give him the send-off he deserved. Also in their expedience to kill off the past story elements and franchise\, they destroyed anything that was worth anticipating for in the next film.

This was my biggest gripe Luke wouldn't hurt a family member if he was willing to sacrifice his life for his dad on the off chance he had goodness in him. 

Making rey a nobody is also dumb. No training and she is a master by the end of the film is also dumb.

It was a shameless cash grab\, that dashed any hope for the next installment.
